name: Community Project Funding/Congressionally Directed Spending
objective: The goal is to fund projects in the amounts specified in the table titled “Community Project Funding/Congressional Directed Spending” in the Explanatory Statement for the U.S. Department of Labor’s annual appropriation.
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: These are 173 independent Community Projects Funding/Congressional Directed Spending programs.
A total of 243 out of 249 appropriated independent Community Projects Funding/Congressional Directed Spending programs were successfully awarded.
